text: Evloghios (Hessler) (February 21, 1935 – January 20, 2019) was a German-born Italian religious figure. He was the Archbishop of Milan and Longobardia from 1990 until his death in 2019. He was Orthodox Metropolitan of Aquileia and Western Europe and Primate of the Holy Synod of Milan. Evloghios died of complications from a stroke in Milan on January 21, 2019 at the age of 83.Скончался председатель Миланского Синода ИПЦ Митрополит Евлогий ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:People from Milan
title: Evloghios (Hessler)
